Sentencas: Catalyst deactivation due to sintering and carbon deposition is one of the main issues associated with electrocatalysis and catalytic hydrocarbon reforming over supported Ni catalysts.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: We report a Ni-Mo bimetallic catalyst supported on ceria-zirconia (CZ) prepared using co-impregnation as an efficient catalyst for partial oxidation of isooctane at high space velocities.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: It is also used as a catalytic micro-reforming layer on a conventional Ni/YSZ-based solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) to form a bi-layer anode.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: The catalysts were characterized using a number of analytical techniques and catalyst performance for partial oxidation of isooctane was investigated at 750 degrees C; atmospheric pressure; air and fuel flow rates of 100 sccm and 3 ml/h, respectively; and O-2/C ratio of 0.4.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: The addition of Mo increases the catalytic activity in terms of isooctane conversion and syngas yields.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: Most significantly, the presence of Mo enhances the long-term stability of the Ni-based catalyst.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: Molybdenum strengthens the interaction between Ni and the support and improves the overall metal dispersion.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: We have further demonstrated that the carbon tolerance of Ni can be significantly improved by Mo addition.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: When applied it as a reforming layer in a SOFC running on isooctane, the cell showed a very slow degradation rate of 4.8 mV h(-1) during 12 h of operation at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane

Sentencas: The excellent catalytic activity and stability suggest that Ni-Mo/CZ is an excellent material for a bi-layer anode of SOFC with superior coke tolerance.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of ceria-zirconia supported Ni-Mo nanoparticles for partial oxidation of isooctane
